steps.name: I open the website http://www.globalsqa.com/angularJs-protractor/BankingProject/#/login
I click bank manager login button
I verify the dashboard manage account in bank
I click Open Account button
I verify the open account screen in bank
I choose customer name Hue Thai, currency Pound
I click on 'Process' button
I verify create customer account successfully Account created successfully with account Number :1016

arguments.val: Account created successfully with account Number :1016

name: In order to open account to have the transaction successfully.

steps.name: I open the website http://www.globalsqa.com/angularJs-protractor/BankingProject/#/login
I click 'Customer Login' button
I verify the correct 'Customer Login' website
I select value as fullnameAdded
I click on 'Login' button
I verify Customer Login successfully
I open the website http://www.globalsqa.com/angularJs-protractor/BankingProject/#/account
I check the correct 'Customer Account' website
I select Account Number
I click on 'Deposit' button
I input amount as 500
I click on 'Deposit' button to deposit
I check the confirm message as Deposit Successful
I click on 'Transactions' button
I verify Transactions page
I check the transactions data with date, 500 and Credit
I open the website http://www.globalsqa.com/angularJs-protractor/BankingProject/#/account
I check the correct 'Customer Account' website
I select Account Number
I click on 'Withdrawl' button
I input amount as 200
I click on 'Withdraw' button to withdraw
I check the confirm message as Transaction successful
I click on 'Transactions' button
I verify Transactions page
I check the transactions data with date, 200 and Debit

I verify the Customers page

I verify the return data as 0
